I've found this pretty funny question in a group of foreigners in Vietnam. I have wondered about this topic too, so I decide to repost it here. What's your opinion :D?

----

For the past 7 months I have been asked this question 4 times by the Vietnamese. Yesterday one of my students asked me it again.

"Why do a lot of Foreigner and sometimes Handsome Foreigner men have a "Ugly" or "Average" looking Vietnamese girlfriend/wife?"

Every time I have been asked this question I say "I don't know" or "To some people looks don't matter"

Anybody else been asked this?
title: I've found this pretty funny question. Can you answer?
